Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a single photo without any additional evidence or context.
Exist alternative explanation: There could be alternative explanations for why BJP activists were wearing burqas, such as disguising their identity or for security reasons, which are not explored in the claim.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the same photo has been circulating online since at least 2015, suggesting that it may not be directly related to the 2019 election.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by presenting the photo as evidence without thoroughly investigating its origins or verifying its relevance to the 2019 election.
Understate: The claim may understate the significance of the photo by not providing enough information or context to fully understand its implications.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence of exaggeration in the claim.
